channel.title: Comments on: Kuri’s Top 10 FAQs
channel.description: Meet Kuri, the adorable home robot.

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi West - Definitely! You can reset Kuri's map at any point for home moves, bringing your robot to a friend's house, or furniture changes. It's super easy to re-map Kuri and teach her a new home layout. Unfortunately, Kuri cannot answer questions or set alarms. If you're interested in learning more about Kuri's communication style, we recommend checking this blog post out: https://blog.heykuri.com/understanding-kuri-speaks/
item.content:encoded: Hi West – Definitely! You can reset Kuri’s map at any point for home moves, bringing your robot to a friend’s house, or furniture changes. It’s super easy to re-map Kuri and teach her a new home layout. Unfortunately, Kuri cannot answer questions or set alarms. If you’re interested in learning more about Kuri’s communication style, we recommend checking this blog post out: https://blog.heykuri.com/understanding-kuri-speaks/

item.title: By: West
item.dc:creator: West
item.description: Will it be possible for Kuri to learn a new floor-plan if her family moves houses? Would she need to be reset in order to do so, or will there perhaps be an option for accomplishing this? Also, it was mentioned previously that Kuri can learn new tasks. What sorts of new tasks might she be able to learn? Also also, will Kuri be able to set alarms and go to different rooms to wake people up? Will she also be able to answer yes or no questions, such as if it will rain? Sorry for asking so many questions! I look forward to receiving Kuri later this Summer!
item.content:encoded: Will it be possible for Kuri to learn a new floor-plan if her family moves houses? Would she need to be reset in order to do so, or will there perhaps be an option for accomplishing this? Also, it was mentioned previously that Kuri can learn new tasks. What sorts of new tasks might she be able to learn? Also also, will Kuri be able to set alarms and go to different rooms to wake people up? Will she also be able to answer yes or no questions, such as if it will rain? Sorry for asking so many questions! I look forward to receiving Kuri later this Summer!

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Jennifer - You're correct, Kuri has shipped. As a customer, you're already familiar with Kuri Vision: Kuri's ability to take 5-second video moments around your home each day. The customers that currently own Kuri have been encouraged to share these moments on social media using #HeyKuri. We invite you to search for those posts! However, please keep in mind that some people prefer to keep such moments to themselves, which is something we fully respect. As more Kuri robots make their way to customers' homes this summer, we expect to see more moments widely shared on social media.
item.content:encoded: Hi Jennifer – You’re correct, Kuri has shipped. As a customer, you’re already familiar with Kuri Vision: Kuri’s ability to take 5-second video moments around your home each day. The customers that currently own Kuri have been encouraged to share these moments on social media using #HeyKuri. We invite you to search for those posts! However, please keep in mind that some people prefer to keep such moments to themselves, which is something we fully respect. As more Kuri robots make their way to customers’ homes this summer, we expect to see more moments widely shared on social media.

item.title: By: Jennifer Luke
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Luke
item.description: I am expecting my Kuri in June or July but I’d like to see some posts on the FB page or here from people who already have Kuri. I want to know their opinions on how Kuri was worth or not worth the investment. I am becoming a little weary since I don’t see any real-owner reviews or posts when it is my understanding that some Kuri’s already shipped!
item.content:encoded: I am expecting my Kuri in June or July but I’d like to see some posts on the FB page or here from people who already have Kuri. I want to know their opinions on how Kuri was worth or not worth the investment. I am becoming a little weary since I don’t see any real-owner reviews or posts when it is my understanding that some Kuri’s already shipped!

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Chuck! There are no plans for developer APIs at this time. We'll update followers via Kuri's email newsletter should that ever change. Great question!
item.content:encoded: Hi Chuck! There are no plans for developer APIs at this time. We’ll update followers via Kuri’s email newsletter should that ever change. Great question!

item.title: By: Chuck Durham
item.dc:creator: Chuck Durham
item.description: Are there plans for any developer APIs to allow programmers the ability to interface with and expand Kuri capabilities. We did some work with UWB and BLE beacons for indoor positioning / tracking - we also have been working on some computer vision routines - so it would be nice to get access to the video stream through some SDK or API. I have Oculus Rift and Samsung WMR headset - working with Unity & Unreal, I think it would be nice to access the video stream and some motion/movement control from within a VR environment.
item.content:encoded: Are there plans for any developer APIs to allow programmers the ability to interface with and expand Kuri capabilities. We did some work with UWB and BLE beacons for indoor positioning / tracking – we also have been working on some computer vision routines – so it would be nice to get access to the video stream through some SDK or API. I have Oculus Rift and Samsung WMR headset – working with Unity & Unreal, I think it would be nice to access the video stream and some motion/movement control from within a VR environment.

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Wayne - Great question! You can stream radio through Kuri via Bluetooth. Please let us know if you have any other questions!
item.content:encoded: Hi Wayne – Great question! You can stream radio through Kuri via Bluetooth. Please let us know if you have any other questions!

item.title: By: Wayne
item.dc:creator: Wayne
item.description: A lot of in home voice activated devices (i.e. Google Alexa, etc.) can stream radio, I know Kuri can play podcasts, but can he (she) also stream radio?
item.content:encoded: A lot of in home voice activated devices (i.e. Google Alexa, etc.) can stream radio, I know Kuri can play podcasts, but can he (she) also stream radio?

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Thomas! Kuri handles hardwood and carpet flooring with ease (including thresholds). Shag carpet is the only flooring we do not recommend for Kuri. Please reach out to our customer care team at support@heykuri.com if you have any further questions. Thanks!
item.content:encoded: Hi Thomas! Kuri handles hardwood and carpet flooring with ease (including thresholds). Shag carpet is the only flooring we do not recommend for Kuri. Please reach out to our customer care team at support@heykuri.com if you have any further questions. Thanks!

item.title: By: Thomas Lee
item.dc:creator: Thomas Lee
item.description: On all your video, Kuri run on wood/solid flooring. How is Kuri doing on carpet flooring? because my house is mostly carpeted. Can I get a reply from Kuri Team? Thank you.
item.content:encoded: On all your video, Kuri run on wood/solid flooring. How is Kuri doing on carpet flooring? because my house is mostly carpeted. Can I get a reply from Kuri Team? Thank you.
